def util.path_fname (   path) 
return (parent_dir, filename), working for both linux and windows

>>> paths =  ['a/b/c/', 'a/b/c']
>>> [path_fname(path) for path in paths]
[('a/b/', 'c'), ('a/b', 'c')]
